# db-studio

> The modern pgAdmin alternative that works with every database

## Overview

db-studio is a modern database management tool designed to work with multiple database systems. It provides a clean, intuitive interface for managing databases, running queries, and exploring data.

## Key Features

- Multi-database support (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and more)
- Modern, intuitive user interface
- Cross-platform desktop application
- Query editor with syntax highlighting
- Table data browsing and editing
- Database schema visualization

## Links

- Website: https://dbstudio.sh
- Documentation: https://dbstudio.sh/docs
- Roadmap: https://dbstudio.sh/roadmap
- Changelog: https://dbstudio.sh/changelog

## About

db-studio is built as a modern alternative to traditional database management tools like pgAdmin, offering a streamlined experience that works consistently across different database systems.
